title: Efficient Business Entry Processes
description: In 2024, Rwanda achieved a perfect score of 100 in the Business Entry Pillar 3: Operational Efficiency, indicating a streamlined process for starting a business.

title: High Gender Representation in Parliament
description: As of 2024, 63.75% of seats in Rwanda's national parliament are held by women, showcasing the country's commitment to gender equality in political representation.

title: Effective Dispute Resolution System
description: Rwanda scored 94.63 in the Ease of Resolving a Commercial Dispute in 2024, reflecting a robust and efficient legal framework for business disputes.

title: Strong Human Resource Development
description: In 2023, Rwanda received a rating of 5 for building human resources, indicating a strong focus on education and workforce development.

title: Low Diarrhea Treatment Coverage
description: In 2020, only 19.3% of children under 5 in Rwanda received oral rehydration and continued feeding for diarrhea treatment, highlighting a critical area for health improvement.

title: Moderate Environmental Sustainability Policies
description: Rwanda's 2023 rating of 4.5 for environmental sustainability policies indicates a solid but improvable framework for ecological conservation.

title: Balanced Revenue Mobilization
description: With a 2023 rating of 4.5, Rwanda demonstrates efficiency in revenue mobilization, supporting fiscal stability and economic growth.

title: Comprehensive Social Inclusion Policies
description: Rwanda's 2023 average rating of 4.4 for social inclusion policies reflects a commitment to equitable growth and social equity.
